Description: The following statement contains a magic number: Content = new ScrollView              {                  Margin = new Thickness(20)'                  Content = new StackLayout                  {                      Children = {                          titleLabel'                          messageLabel'                          button'                          activityIndicator'                          stackLayout'                          imageLabel'                          image                      }                  }              };

The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (Device.RuntimePlatform)              {                  case Device.iOS:                      messageLabel.Text = "Use two fingers to swipe up or down the screen to read each element on the page.";                      break;                  case Device.Android:                      messageLabel.Text = "Quickly swipe right or left to navigate through elements on the page in sequence.";                      break;                  case Device.UWP:                      messageLabel.Text = "Use three fingers to swipe up the screen to read each element on the page.";                      break;              }
